Trotoar Fatmawati Jadi Area Parkir Liar, Satpol PP: Sudah Sering Ditertibkan
03 Nov 2019, 08:13 by Audrey Santoso
Jakarta - Alih fungsi trotoar di daerah Fatmawati, Jakarta Selatan (Jaksel) menjadi tempat parkir liar dan pedagang kaki lima (PKL) tak dipungkiri oleh pihak Satuan Polisi Pamong Praja (Satpol PP) Jaksel. Kendaraan yang parkir dan pedagang yang mangkal di jalur pejalan kaki itu disebut sering ditertibkan, namun masih saja nakal.
"Sebenarnya sih di traffic light Fatmawati sudah seringkali kami tertibkan. Jadi sebenarnya itu kebetulan saja memang ada yang masih nakal. Kami sudah rutin pagi, siang, sore menjaga kondisi areal trotroal Fatmawati supaya steril dari PKL dan parkiran liar," kata Kasatpol PP Jaksel Ujang Hermawan kepada detikcom, Sabtu (2/11/2019).
Ujang berharap masalah ini menjadi perhatian petugas Pol PP di Kecamatan Cilandak dan Kebayoran Baru, agar petugas langsung mengambil tindakan tegas manakala menemukan trotoar yang digunakan tidak sesuai peruntukannya.
"(Fatmawati) ini kan (dilingkup) dua kecamatan , Cilandak dan Kebayoran Baru dan dari tingkat kota memonitoring daerah tersebut karena kan itu area MRT dan ada jalur sepedanya. Ini kan trotoar sudah rapih, nah harapan saya ya memang ini menjadi perhatian untuk anggota saya di dua kecamatan itu," ujar Ujang.
"Adapun sewaktu-waktu ada yang bandel, kita tindak. Selama ini kalau kami melihat ada kendaraan parkir liar, kami cabut pentil (ban), ada yang kami hukum push up," imbuh Ujang.

Fatmawati Sidewalk Becomes a Wild Parking Area, Satpol PP: Already Regulated
03 Nov 2019, 08:13 by Audrey Santoso
Jakarta - Transfer of the sidewalk function in Fatmawati area, South Jakarta (South Jakarta) becomes a illegal parking lot and street vendors (PKL) are not denied by the South Jakarta Civil Service Police Unit (Satpol PP). Vehicles parked and traders who hung in the pedestrian lane were called often disciplined, but still naughty.
"Actually, we often order the Fatmawati traffic light. So actually it just happens to be that there are still naughty. We have been routinely morning, noon, evening protecting the condition of Fatmawati trotroal areas so that they are sterile from street vendors and illegal parking," said Kasatpol PP South Jakarta Ujang Hermawan told AFP on Saturday (11/02/2019).
Ujang hoped that this issue would be of concern to PP police officers in Cilandak and Kebayoran Baru Subdistricts, so that officers would immediately take decisive action when finding the sidewalks that were used were not in accordance with their designation.
"(Fatmawati) right (enclosed) two sub-districts, Cilandak and Kebayoran Baru and from the city level are monitoring the area because it is an MRT area and there is a bicycle lane. This is the sidewalk already tidy, well my hope is that this is a concern for my members in the two districts, "Ujang said.
"As for at times there is something stubborn, we take action. So far, if we see there are illegal parking vehicles, we pull out the nipples (tires), there are those we push up," Ujang added.
